name: Jordan Kim
persona: Jordan Kim is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who maintains a CGPA of 2.71. Jordan is moderately conscientious and generally believes in their academic abilities, though sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety. Despite occasional setbacks, Jordan is motivated to improve and demonstrates strong perseverance when faced with challenges. They are determined to finish their degree and are actively seeking ways to boost their grades and study habits.
